name: T3tris
description:
-VIDEO-
-Description-

What if Tetris was 3D? You get T3tris, a game where you need to control Tetrominoes in 3D to get the highest score. Enjoy! ❤️

PS: This game was made in less than 2 weeks and multiple bugs (like multi-line clearing not working) exist, this was supposed to just be a small project, hope you still enjoy! :)
